p: DAPC on the worldwide microsatellite and SNP chip datasets indicated (by the Bayesian Information Criterion-BIC) 20 DAPC-groups, with the majority (microsatellites dataset; 68 out of the 91) or all (SNP chip dataset) of the Black Sea individuals forming a single distinct group (Additional file 1: Figure S4). Focusing on the Black Sea, BIC supported three groups, (Additional file 1: Figure S5) with no clear distinction between Georgia and Turkey populations.
